# iosxr_line_default (Data Source)

This data source can read the Line Default configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_line_default" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `absolute_timeout` (Number) Set absolute timeout for line disconnection.
- `access_class_egress` (String) Filter outgoing connections
- `access_class_ingress` (String) Filter incoming connections
- `accounting_commands` (String) For exec (shell) commands
- `accounting_exec` (String) For starting an exec (shell)
- `authorization_commands` (String) For exec (shell) commands
- `authorization_eventmanager` (String) Set eventmanager authorization method
- `authorization_exec` (String) For starting an exec (shell)
- `autocommand` (String) Automatically execute an EXEC command
- `cli_whitespace_completion` (Boolean) Command completion on whitespace
- `disconnect_character` (String) Define the disconnect character. Converts to hexadecimal.
- `escape_character` (String) Define the escape character. Converts to hexadecimal.
- `exec_timeout_minutes` (Number) Set EXEC timeout
- `exec_timeout_seconds` (Number) Timeout in seconds
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `length` (Number) Set number of lines on a screen.
- `login_authentication` (String) Authentication parameters
- `pager` (String) To enable pager functionality
- `password_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted password
- `secret_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) The encrypted user password string
- `session_limit` (Number) Set the number of outgoing connections
- `session_timeout` (Number) Set interval for closing connection when there is no input traffic
- `session_timeout_output` (Boolean) Include output traffic as well as input traffic
- `telnet_transparent` (Boolean) Send a CR as a CR followed by a NULL instead of a CR followed by a LF
- `timeout_login_response` (Number) Timeouts for any user input during login sequence
- `timestamp_disable` (Boolean) To disable timestamp printing before each command.
- `transport_input_all` (Boolean) All protocols
- `transport_input_none` (Boolean) No protocols
- `transport_input_ssh` (Boolean) Unix ssh protocol
- `transport_input_ssh_telnet` (Boolean) TCP/IP Telnet protocol
- `transport_input_telnet` (Boolean) TCP/IP Telnet protocol
- `transport_output_all` (Boolean) All protocols
- `transport_output_none` (Boolean) No protocols
- `transport_output_ssh` (Boolean) Unix ssh protocol
- `transport_output_ssh_telnet` (Boolean) TCP/IP Telnet protocol
- `transport_output_telnet` (Boolean) TCP/IP Telnet protocol
- `transport_preferred_none` (Boolean) No protocols
- `transport_preferred_ssh` (Boolean) Unix ssh protocol
- `transport_preferred_telnet` (Boolean) TCP/IP Telnet protocol
- `users_group` (Attributes List) Name of the user group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users_group))
- `width` (Number) Set width of the display terminal.
